position: Founder - FinLadder | LinkedIn Top Voice | Speaker - TEDx, Josh | Educator | Creator

experience.title: Co-Founder
experience.description: FinLadder is an online educational organization which regularly prepares students and professionals to prepare for various finance courses including those conducted by NSE. Thousands of students from universities all around India including Delhi University, Indian Institute of Management, Indraprastha University, Symbiosis are engaged with them.The students belong to different backgrounds and states and they all share common groups to entail knowledge about the aforementioned certifications.The main objective of this organization is to promote financial literacy in India and abroad.

Thousands of students from universities all around India including Delhi University, Indian Institute of Management, Indraprastha University, Symbiosis are engaged with them.The students belong to different backgrounds and states and they all share common groups to entail knowledge about the aforementioned certifications.The main objective of this organization is to promote financial literacy in India and abroad.

experience.title: Finance and Accounts Intern
experience.description: JSPL is an industry powerhouse with a dominant presence in steel, power, mining and infrastructure sectors.My work as a finance and accounts intern comprised of the following-- prepared research sheets on company's future projects.- worked on SAP to learn and perform various accounting activities including general ledger, accounts payable and accounts receivables.- helped in analysing the changes in the forex trades due to change in foreign exchange rate.- provided insights on current projects.Moreover I learnt to work in a large organisation and was fortunate to experience such a remarkable corporate experience.
experience.description_html: JSPL is an industry powerhouse with a dominant presence in steel, power, mining and infrastructure sectors.My work as a finance and accounts intern comprised of the following-- prepared research sheets on company's future projects.- worked on SAP to learn and perform various accounting activities including general ledger, accounts payable and accounts receivables.- helped in analysing the changes in the forex trades due to change in foreign exchange rate.- provided insights on current projects.Moreover I learnt to work in a large organisation and was fortunate to experience such a remarkable corporate experience.
